meanings.definition: A discount or reduction in price.
meanings.sent1: I got a great rabats on my new shoes!
meanings.sent2: The store offered a rabats on all winter coats.
meanings.sent3: The rabats on the dress made it a steal!
meanings.sent4: The rabats was like finding treasure at the end of a rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The rabats made me feel like I won the lottery!

meanings.definition: A decorative strip of fabric or lace used in clothing.
meanings.sent1: She added a beautiful rabats to her dress.
meanings.sent2: The wedding gown had intricate rabats along the hem.
meanings.sent3: The rabats on the costume made it look fancy.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit sparkled with the rabats like stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The rabats on the collar added a touch of elegance.

meanings.definition: A type of joint in masonry work.
meanings.sent1: The rabats in the brick wall were expertly done.
meanings.sent2: The mason carefully crafted the rabats for a strong structure.
meanings.sent3: The playful squirrel tried to hide acorns in the rabats of the wall.
meanings.sent4: The rabats held the stones together like a hug.
meanings.sent5: The intricate rabats added character to the building.
